name: Blue Trainwreck
description: Imagine a train full of blueberries smashing into your face and that pretty much describes Blue Train.  A cross of two great strains, Trainwreck and Blueberry, this strain provides pleasant head effects that are sure to lift your mood.
attributes_title: Tingly, Relaxed, Hungry, Happy, Euphoric, Pain, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid
